title: Build Paths for Ahri Top Lane?
body: I go Ahri top lane for about 30% of my games because I put top as my secondary role and I'm an Ahri otp. What do you guys think are some viable builds for {{champion:103}} in this position? I usually go ROA and Rylais but I don't feel that they should be used every game.

replies.body:
Ooooohhhh, another otp like mee :DD 

unfortunatly most things are situational but...
https://youtu.be/ABYCl30S21A
This will cover it better then I can

I mean he gives like 3 builds for Ahri Top lane which are more or less similar to ROA and Rylais. Besides the tank build, the only difference from a standard Ahri build that he uses is Rylais and Archangel. Doesn't differ too much from regular mid lane builds. Building Archangels is pretty interesting though, and I have experimented with it. It really only works in certain matchups but it's generally harmful to Ahri as it doesn't allow her to excel in the mid game where she's most good at. There are some other items that could work such as hextech glp, protobelt, and liandry's. I feel like his builds could improve tbh.
Sry :/ Best I can do with my lack of sleep right now, maybe in the morning?

It's fine. I'll probably just test builds myself. And Vertigal was wrong about {{item:3152}}  being bad so I don't think everything he does is perfect. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qwZ8JkN-W9M
He says it's bad at around 31:47. He couldn't discern that Protobelt was a viable item at the time, so I don't think he'd be able to know if there isn't another good Ahri Top lane build that exists.

This will not work in almost every matchup.

Honestly, ADC triforce>pd>ie (as weird as it sounds) works way better than top (and it is viable at just about any MMR, top you will just get shut down by any fighter or tank and be useless).
So you're saying that Ahri Top should follow an adc build? Why?

No, i am saying you should play Ahri ADC instead, because it is less awful.

Something like this http://www.mobafire.com/league-of-legends/build/adc-ahri-by-chubbzilla-457982
https://www.reddit.com/r/AhriMains/comments/50umvr/adc_ahri/

It actually does work very well.
Why is it less awful? Vertigal has gotten masters with Ahri Top.
